text: Philatelic materials are postage stamps, se-tenants, souvenir sheets, sheets of stamps, postal stationery, postal markings, and other indicia (markings on a mail piece showing that postage has been paid by the sender) that are objects of stamp collecting. == Related pages == * Kiloware * Miniature sheet * Mint stamp * Postage meter * Postage stamp == Other websites == * Hawaiian missionaries Category:Philately
title: Philatelic materials
